snippet: U.S. fund managers cut their recommended global equity allocation in a model portfolio for a sixth consecutive month in November and increased their bond holdings for the fourth month in a row, a Reuters poll showed....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Funds Turn Against Stocks but Favour North American Assets-Reuters Poll
headline.main: U.S. Funds Turn Against Stocks but Favour North American Assets-Reuters Poll

lead_paragraph: U.S. fund managers cut their recommended global equity allocation in a model portfolio for a sixth consecutive month in November and increased their bond holdings for the fourth month in a row, a Reuters poll showed.
